text: "That castle is going to be our doom."
"CAN'T AVOID THE MISSILE-- CHASES ME FOR DAYS AND D"
"Hey, this is just like that old video game fulla demons and stuff!  Except you can't piss yourself in that one."
"that's how the spiders get ya-- they're under the damn ground"
"From mom's legs the ooze flows.  Her trail is miles long, and still she shambles"
"F I   RE  A NNNT  Q UU EEN"
"Sometimes the best offense is a good defense.  Mister Zombie Tank knows that well!"
"they git bigger in eech new town.  dont matter.  shotgun do the same to all of em.  when it doesnt, thats when i gotsa worry."
"It's in our nature to evolve.  The blob just lets it happen faster.  Sometimes out of necessity-- and sometimes just for fun..."
"animata all unrecognizable.  mounds of flesh, scabs, muscle, acid.  screeching out my name, they know it by now"
"So many ripples in space-- what's real and what's not?"
"I shall wear your Megabear Face as a Crown!  I am God!"
"Dreams of triffids envelop me and suck sap into my tired wounds"
"Joe wasnt human anymore, he was fungus-- it's NOT MY FAULT! HE WASN'T ALIVE, OH GoD"
"The acidic web spider wrote in its fungal web... 'SOME SQUIG'"
